symptoms_patient_terms: Red spots or ulcers on gums

differentials.name: Fungal stomatitis
clues: Often poor hygiene; sleeping with denture

probable_causes: High pressure points from new/warped denture
Poor hygiene and wearing denture overnight
Weight change or ridge resorption over time
investigations: Denture fit check with pressure indicator
Oral mucosa exam for ulcers/fungal signs
do_now: Remove denture overnight; keep it clean and dry
donts: Don’t self-adjust with files or hot water
Don’t sleep with dentures in (unless advised)

professional_care.name: Relining/adjustment
professional_care.what_it_does: Reshapes inner surface for better fit

pregnancy_nursing: Treat fungal infections promptly; maintain hygiene
systemic_notes: Diabetes increases fungal risk; xerostomia reduces denture retention—manage saliva

prevention: Remove dentures nightly and clean properly
Avoid very hard/sticky foods with loose dentures
complications: Poor nutrition due to chewing pain
